original_text: You said that you would punish everyone who does not obey you. You said you would throw them into the middle of a very hot fire.
korean_text: 누구든지 엎드려 절하지 아니하는 자는 맹렬히 타는 풀무불 가운데에 던져 넣음을 당하리라 하지 아니하셨나이까
